backend/main.mo: Main canister logic implementing inquiries, user profiles, and admin/user authorization with role checks and mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration types and returns old state unchanged during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing features, involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app root and main entrypoint.
frontend/PREVIEW_VALIDATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist to verify preview environment readiness before testing admin login and dashboard.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Smoke‑test instructions for validating production deployment functionality and admin flows.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that stores the requested path and redirects to root for client-side routing.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: Admin HTML entry page mounting the React app for the /admin route.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app with routing, admin guard, deep-link restoration, and main site sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Empty or placeholder admin login prompt component.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Provides per-inquiry admin actions like marking read/unread, deleting, and includes bulk export helpers.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Admin list view that filters, searches, and bulk-updates inquiries with detailed UI controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/OfficialLo: Modal dialog for official login with form validation, loading state, and success callback.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Reusable logo image component with configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a styled error screen and resets by reloading the homepage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with business info, disclaimer, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Form for submitting inquiries with validation, API submission, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling and smooth-scrolling section links.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminLo: Empty or placeholder admin login section component.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section showing business address, operator, phone, and WhatsApp links using siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Displays a centered inquiry form inside a styled card with title and description.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Implements the hero banner with business info, call/WhatsApp buttons, and an official login dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows categorized service cards generated from siteContent, each listing related service items.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Renders a grid of reasons to choose the business, sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides all static site content including business details, hero text, services, and footer metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto‑invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Admin-specific actor hook that initializes access control with an admin token, supports timeouts, retries, and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, deleting, and updating inquiry read status using the admin actor with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialAdminToken: Reads and tracks the admin token from sessionStorage, updating state on custom or storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLogin.ts: Implements a simple official login system using hardcoded credentials, storing session state and notifying listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that submits inquiries to the backend using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based theme variables and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling login state, data fetching, session errors, and inquiry display actions.
frontend/src/utils/adminError.ts: Utility functions for parsing errors, detecting authorization or replica issues, and extracting replica rejection details.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Exports inquiries to JSON or CSV with formatting helpers for timestamps and CSV-safe values.
frontend/src/utils/navigation.ts: Provides a navigation helper that updates browser history and triggers SPA routing events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear them across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, shadows, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, admin login workflow, known issues, and current architectural notes for the Vaishnavi E‑Mitra & CSC website.
